answers.answer: Im 38+2 and my last appointment they told me i was already 1cm . I had a feeling my baby was going to come sooner, but now im thinking differently.  Today is my appointment, so hopefully ive progressed.  I hope everything goes well with you!

We have the same due date :DMy appointment yesterdAy my doc said i was 1 cm dilated and walking helps... She told me it could be from 12 hours to 24 hours to become fully dilate so please dont be discouraged. Everyone tries to intimidate me by saying oh she'll be late blH blah but i try my best on my part, there's a lot of safe ways to get it going just search it up and walk walk walk. Hopefully your next appointment youll be dilated more and no need for the induction. Goodluck sweety were almost there!!

I'm 38 weeks today. My due date is the 13the and up until last night I thought I was going to be over due. But I got my fist sign of mucus plug. My doc told me three days ago I was 1 centimeter dilated and my baby still haven't dropped and she has a long ways to go. But just that little mucus I seen gave me hope
36 weeks 5 days, 2.5 centimeters dilated and in pain for the last 9 days

I'm 37 weeks and 3cm dilated as of Monday. My midwife was like "oh shes coming", I can feel her right above my stuff and it hurts to walk. She may come early! I'm trying to keep her in at least another week.
No dialation for me.. I'm 50% effaced tho.. and I'm 36w2d with my first
Guess I could do some walking& have some sex I heard that helps .
I'm 38w & 5d and have been dilated to 3cm since week 34. I'm very worried I will have to either be induced or go over due because I haven't had any progress since then....good luck to all mamas!!
Im going to be 38 weeks tomorrow im not dialated any and the doc is saying im too small for my baby so I have to have a voluntary c section
Im 35w5d and 4/5cm &90% effaced already..hoping to see my little boy soon but not this soon!
38 weeks not dialated yet :( 50% effaced though. Im going to do lots of walking & a membrane sweep next appointment. I do not want to be induced.

ill be 38 weeks tomorrow due on the 14th i go to dr tomorrow ive been so miserable the last week my feet have started swelling and hurts to walk but ive been 1 cm for over a month hoping ive progressed some when she checks me tomorrow been losing my plug a little at a time the last 2 weeks and he has been dropped for over a week im just ready to have him!
Due august 26, being induced at 37 weeks because of preeclampsia.. thats in 6 days! And its scary. But at the same time so exciting. Hopefully august is full of healthy babies!(:
Due August 17 and that makes me 37 weeks 4 days. Had hip pain all yesterday so hopefully that means my pelvic bone is opening up... really don't want to go over.

question: Hows Everything Going For You...As Far As Dilating Im 39.2 Weeks & Still Only A Fingertip Dilated Im Very Disappointed Because Ik That Means 9 times out of 10 Ill Have To Be Induced &I Didnt Want That Because Its Painful. My Doc &I Discussed Induction yesterday which made me very discouraged w.delivering on my due date I was really hoping to go in on my own Im Due on the 4th btw which is in 5 days &I dnt thnk much is going to change by then.
title: Hey August Moms
